## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                  | Type                                                          | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `cols`   | `cols`    | Defines general column width | `1 \| 10 \| 11 \| 12 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6 \| 7 \| 8 \| 9` | `undefined` |
| `pull`   | `pull`    | Defines column pulling       | `1 \| 10 \| 11 \| 12 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6 \| 7 \| 8 \| 9` | `undefined` |
| `push`   | `push`    | Defines column pushing       | `1 \| 10 \| 11 \| 12 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6 \| 7 \| 8 \| 9` | `undefined` |
